casebody.data:
Third Department,

October, 1960

(October 19, 1960) In the Matter of Monroe Goldwater, Respondent, v. Caroline K. Simon, as Secretary of State, Respondent, and Socialist Labor Party Nominees for Electors of President et al., Appellants.

Order affirmed, without costs, on the opinion of Mr. Justice MacAffer at Trial Term. (24 Mise 2d 430.) Coon, J. P., Gibson and Reynolds, JJ., concur; Herlihy, J. I concur in the result. I have serious doubts as to that part of the decision which invalidated the signatures due to the mistake made by the authenticating witness but which in this case would not change the result.
